About Us

Our Story
We are a purpose and values driven company
We enrich lives, nourish the soul and make our community a better place; every dish, every day
We are team-oriented
We have integrity
We use intentional communication
We have a passion for excellence
Culinary Pride
We take great pride in our culinary culture, serving the highest quality fresh, local, organic (when possible), and expertly prepared food
end feature
Sharing Success
We share in our success by contributing financially to local community organizations focused on hunger and the local environment
end feature
Small Footprint
We try to make as small a footprint as we can by reducing, reusing and recycling to help keep Florida and our planet beautiful
end feature
INTEGRITY, VALUE, PURPOSE
Join Our Team
Our passion for great food and service drives our training and development. In keeping with these values, we have fun working as a team and provide a clean and safe work environment
See What We Have To Offe
r
DOWN THE STREET, MILES FROM ORDINARY
Our Locations
Micanopy
The original Blue Highway, a pizzeria is a small roadside restaurant located on scenic Highway 441, at the entrance to historic Micanopy between Ocala and Gainesville, Florida. Famous for antiques and as the location for the film Doc Hollywood, the small unbelievably picturesque town is home to the original “Highway to Pizza Heaven.” The ambiance is fun, funky, and casual, reminding you that driving down the blue highways of small town USA can bring unexpected treasures.
Tioga
Blue Highway at Tioga, located in Tioga Town Center, the second location, opened in 2009, answering the demand for high quality pizza in the more suburban NW Gainesville area. It’s a slightly more “uptown” setting but the food is just as incredible as it is at our original location. We have also been able to add pastas and fabulous daily specials to the menu. The Tioga Town Center location has a lot going on; concerts, movies, shopping and of course great food! All located just 3 miles west of the I75 Newberry Road exit.

Work With Us

Join Our Team
Welcome to Blue Highway Pizza! Prior to completing the application for employment, please understand that we are serious about creating a positive and productive working environment for our team and maintaining the highest levels of quality and service for our guests.
Please take a moment and read our Purpose and Values, they are the driving force behind everything we do.
OUR PURPOSE
We enrich lives, nourish the soul, and make our community a better place; every dish, every day
OUR BENEFITS
Earnings range from $15-$25 per hour between hourly wage and tip share
Paid vacation after 12 months
Full health, dental, vision and life insurance are available
Holiday pay (Thanksgiving & Christmas)
401K Employer contributing
Referral Incentives
Meal discounts
Flexible schedule
Room for growth
Bonuses available
We are a purpose and value driven company and we hire and fire based on these qualities:
We are team-oriented
We have integrity
We use intentional communication
We have a passion for excellence
Download Application
Apply in Person at One of Our Two
Locations
